game.title: Ancient Relic
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient relic from the lost temple.
game.description: Legends tell of a powerful ancient relic hidden within the ruins of a long-lost temple. Many have tried to find it, but none have succeeded. Are you brave enough to venture into the temple and retrieve the relic?
game.reward: The relic, along with a substantial amount of gold and experience.

task.description: The first step is to find the lost temple. It is said to be located deep within the forest, but its exact location is unknown.

task.objective: Defeat the guardians of the temple.
task.description: Once you have found the temple, you will need to defeat the guardians who protect it. These guardians are powerful and dangerous, so be prepared for a fight.
Once you have defeated the guardians, you can search the temple for the ancient relic. It is said to be hidden in a secret chamber, so be sure to search thoroughly.

task.objective: Return the relic to the old wizard.
task.description: Once you have found the relic, return it to the old wizard. He will be overjoyed, and he will reward you for your bravery.
